title: Live & or let die
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Euthanasia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Right to die
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Right to die
description: Episode of Series "The Best of Lateline". This lateline program examines the issues surrounding the legalisation of euthanasia. The first portion of the program looks at the situation in Holland where euthanasia is decriminalised. The second portion of the program is a panel discussion between 3 doctors who present a range of opinions on this topic. The video includes Teacher's Notes. No other credits available.
related_objects: Series; S01206; The Best of Lateline; Active; 1990
